message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic deal on this product. I'm willing to part with it for $13,000. I think it will be incredibly valuable for you, let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I still believe that $9,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
